law.catch_line: Commissioner's power to stay orders pending exhaustion of administrative remedies.
law.text: The commissioner may stay, suspend, or postpone the effective date of an order issued under this subtitle, pending the administrative proceeding and the issuance of a final order resulting from the proceeding, upon written request by the affected person, licensee, or agent.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 854, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247, sec. 26, effective April 24, 2006.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). This section was created in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247 as a new section of KRS Chapter 366A. Sec. 38 of that same bill also required that all sections of KRS Chapters 287, 288, 290, 291, 294, 366, 366A, and 368 be renumbered as sections of a single KRS chapter entitled the "Kentucky Financial Services Code." Therefore, the Statute Reviser, acting under KRS 7.136(1), has codified this section as a new section of KRS Chapter 286.
